snippet: The killing by two police officers of a man who they said they believed was suicidal, according to the Police Department, was met with anger in Indianapolis.
abstract: Indianapolis police fatally shoot unidentified man after he attacked officer while wielding knife; shooting incites anger in community, while officers involved are put on paid administrative leave pending investigation.
lead_paragraph: The killing by two police officers of a man who they said they believed was suicidal, according to the Police Department, was met with anger in Indianapolis.

headline.main: Indianapolis Police Kill Man Who Had Knife
headline.print_headline: Man Is Shot by Police in Indianapolis
